name: • • • — — — • • •
description:
Take on the role of a young journalist responsible for writing all of the headlines in the world-renowned newspaper "Daily Global Game Jam".

Unfortunately, you can't find any functioning typewriters nearby, so you'll have to resort to writing out your masterpieces in morse code instead.
Earn money for each correct letter you type and lose substantially more for each letter you get wrong, if you seek the thrills of working for less than minimum wage and living on the brink of poverty, this game is for you.
And remember, every headline will be printed on every copy of the newspaper, so don't make any mistakes.

Made by:
Julian Schönbächler & Christian Schmidhalter & Jeffrey Smith

Headlines from:
betteridgeslaw.com

Controls:
"lmb" or "."  to type a dot.
"rmb"  or "-" to type a minus.
